description: GDD required for emergence - faster germination
GDD required for flowering - earlier flowering
GDD required for maturity - earlier maturity
Maximum daily biomass accumulation (kg/ha/day) - high yielding variety
Grain to total biomass ratio - improved harvest index
Maximum soil water storage (mm) - good soil
Minimum available soil water (mm) - low wilting point
Initial soil water content (mm) - well watered start
Base temperature for weather generation (°C) - optimal temp
Probability of no rainfall (0-1) - more rain days
